trans-unit.source: Enables packet routing and the use of one-way methods.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer pakke som ruting og bruk av enveis metoder.

trans-unit.source: To enable packet routing a *one-way conversion* layer is required, which this class provides.
trans-unit.target: Aktivere pakke som ruting en *enveis konvertering* laget er obligatorisk, som gir denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: This class is a binding in the stack of bindings that performs a message-level shape change called `OneWayBindingElement`.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er en binding i bunken over bindinger som ikke utfører en melding på radnivå form endring kalles `OneWayBindingElement`.

trans-unit.source: This shape change can take a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel> or a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> and expose it as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel>, or conversely it can take a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel> or a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> and expose it as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.
trans-unit.target: Denne formen endringen kan ta en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>eller <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel>og vise den som en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel>, eller omvendt det kan ta en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>eller en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel>og vise den som en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputChannel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputChannel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IDuplexSessionChannel>

trans-unit.source: A user can create a custom binding that layers this binding over a session-aware or request-reply transport to make it packet routable.
trans-unit.target: En bruker kan opprette en egendefinert binding som lag denne bindingen over en økt-bevisste eller forespørsel-svar transport å gjøre det pakke rutes.

trans-unit.source: This class is also useful when you want to expose one-way methods in a more native fashion.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen er også nyttig når du vil vise enveis metoder på flere opprinnelige måte.

trans-unit.source: More transformations can be applied over this layer, such as Composite Duplex and Reliable Messaging.
trans-unit.target: Flere transformeringer kan brukes over dette laget, for eksempel sammensatte dobbeltsidig og pålitelig meldingstjeneste.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.OneWayBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.OneWayBindingElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the channel pool settings.
trans-unit.target: Henter kanalen innstillinger for applikasjonsutvalg.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelPoolSettings"></xref> object that contains properties of the channel pool associated with this binding element.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelPoolSettings"> </xref> objekt som inneholder egenskapene for utvalget kanalen som er forbundet med bindingselementet.

trans-unit.source: Clones an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Kloner en forekomst av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: A cloned copy of this instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: En klonede kopi av denne forekomsten av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of channels that can be accepted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir det maksimale antallet kanaler godtas.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of channels that can be accepted.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall kanaler som kan godtas.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 10.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether packet routing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om pakke som ruting er aktivert.

trans-unit.source: This class can optionally use a message-level protocol that transforms a `DuplexSessionChannel`/`RequestChannel`/`ReplyChannel` to a one-way channel and allows the messages from the transformed channel to be routed.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan eventuelt bruke en melding på radnivå protokoll som transformerer en `DuplexSessionChannel` / `RequestChannel` / `ReplyChannel` til en enveis kanal og gjør meldinger fra transformert kanalen rutes.

trans-unit.source: Usage of this protocol is controlled by the PacketRoutable property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av denne protokollen styres av egenskapen PacketRoutable.

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, upon `DuplexSessionChannel` initiation (for example, Buffered TCP and Named Pipes), this class adds a message header (MustUnderstand = `false`, signed if security is enabled) that semantically means “you can packet-route this channel”.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er `true`, når `DuplexSessionChannel` Start (for eksempel bufret TCP og navngitte datakanaler) denne klassen legger til en meldingshodet (MustUnderstand = `false`, logget hvis sikkerhet er aktivert) som betyr semantisk "kan du pakke-rute denne kanalen".

trans-unit.source: On the acceptor side, when this property is `true`, this class looks for this header in the first message received on the channel.
trans-unit.target: På siden acceptor når denne egenskapen er `true`, denne klassen ser for dette i den første meldingen mottatt for kanalen.

trans-unit.source: If this header does not exist, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] faults the channel.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette hodet ikke finnes, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] faults kanalen.

trans-unit.source: If the header exists, then [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] funnels the new channel into a shared input channel.
trans-unit.target: Hvis overskriften finnes deretter [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] funnels den nye kanalen til en delt inndatakanal.

trans-unit.source: To transform a Request-Reply channel (for example, TCP Streaming or HTTP) when this property is `true`, this header is added to every request to signal that the request can be packet routed.
trans-unit.target: Ikke transformere en forespørsel-svar-kanalen (for eksempel TCP-avspilling eller HTTP) når denne egenskapen er `true`, denne overskriften legges til hver forespørsel om å signalisere at forespørselen kan være pakke rutet.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] also verifies that `SendRequest` returns `null` and replies with `null` on the server.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]kontrollerer også at `SendRequest` returnerer `null` og svar med `null` på serveren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if packet routing is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Pakkeplanlegging ruting er aktivert. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the properties of the channel pool that are associated with this binding element should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om egenskaper for utvalget kanalen som er forbundet med bindingselementet skal serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the channel pool settings should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis innstillingene kanal applikasjonsutvalget skal serialiseres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Exports a custom policy assertion that represents the one-way binding element.
trans-unit.target: Eksporterer en egendefinert policy-deklarasjon som representerer bindingselementet enveis.

trans-unit.source: This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skriver bindingen-relaterte setninger i WSDL-informasjon som vises av bestemte kontrakten og brukes av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å kommunisere med klienter forekomsten av egendefinerte bindingselementet i stakken binding.

trans-unit.source: This method takes two parameters: the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tar to parametere: den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext>objekter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A>metoder for å hente samlinger av policydeklarasjon som allerede har blitt eksportert på forskjellige omfang.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: Deretter Bruk denne metoden til å legge til egne policydeklarasjon riktig samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> property exposes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> for the endpoint that is being exported.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>egenskapen viser den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>for sluttpunktet som eksporteres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at denne metoden skal være omfang riktig deres eksporterte policydeklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes in code can add behaviors to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that indicate where security policy assertions should be added.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetsattributter i koden kan for eksempel legge virkemåter til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>som angi der sikkerhet policydeklarasjon skal legges til.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Når egendefinerte policydeklarasjon er knyttet til WSDL-informasjonen, klienter kan oppdage og importere de egendefinerte bindingen deklarasjoner ved å implementere et <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>grensesnitt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"> </xref> som du kan bruke til å endre eksporterer prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"> </xref> som du kan bruke til å sette inn egendefinert policy-deklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: context is .
trans-unit.target: contextis .
